abstract.locale: The 'radialGradient' element is used to define radial gradients.

description.locale: Defines the center 'x' coordinate of the largest (i.e., outermost) circle for the radial gradient. If the attribute is not specified, the effect is as if a value of "50%" were specified.
Defines the center 'y' coordinate of the largest (i.e., outermost) circle for the radial gradient. If the attribute is not specified, the effect is as if a value of "50%" were specified.
Defines the radius size of the largest (i.e., outermost) circle for the radial gradient. If the attribute is not specified, the effect is as if a value of "50%" were specified.
A URI reference to a different 'linearGradient' or 'radialGradient' element within the current SVG document fragment.
